description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler with virtual callback methods for different event types within the WPEFramework Plugin namespace.

classes.name: WPEFramework::Plugin::IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface class declaring callback methods for handling various runtime events, including runtime manager, window manager, ripple, and state change events.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked when a runtime management event occurs; takes a JsonObject reference as data.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Callback invoked upon window management events; takes a JsonObject reference as data.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Callback for ripple events, with event name as a string and associated JsonObject as data.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Callback for state change events, receiving a JsonObject as data.
